### Hi, I'm [Md. Abdus Sami Akanda][website] 👋

## I am a Researcher, Student, Learner, Physicist, Web Developer, Programmer, Teacher, Bookworm, and Back-Bencher!!

- 🔭 I just launched my new course: [Basic C Programming][course]!
- 🌱 I’m currently working as a full-time research assistant in Khulna University
- 👯 I’m looking to collaborate with researchers
- 🥅 2021 Goals: Publish scientific research and do some cool web projects
- ⚡ Fun fact: I love to have long walks
